conclusion_text.summary:
As Per Gives Information Available Documents to Me/ us The Said Residential Property House No.254, situated at Gram Panchayat Area Hasalpur, P. H. No. 33, Land Survey No. 507, Gram Hasalpur, Tahsil Mhow, District Indore (M.P.), Was Previously Belong as Owner Mr. Abdul Gani S/o Mr. Mohammed, R/o:- Gram Hasalpur, Tahsil Mhow, District Indore (M.P.).

That, Mr. Abdul Gani S/o Mr. Mohammed, R/o:- Gram Hasalpur, Tahsil Mhow, District Indore (M.P.), got a Land holder of population in village of Certificate No. 3/A-74, Year 2012-13, from Court of Tahsildar Tahsil Dr. Ambedkar Nagar (Mhow), District Indore (M.P.), for Area 154.5 sqr mtr.

That, Mr. Abdul Gani S/o Mr. Mohammed & Mrs. Akila Bee W/o Mr. Abdul Gani Got Drone Certificate Year 2025-26. for Area 0.0288 hectares.

That, Mr. Abdul Gani S/o Mr. Mohammed, R/o:- Gram Hasalpur, Tahsil Mhow, District Indore (M.P.), Gives Possession on the said Property in their Respected Area:- 3099 Sq. Ft (288 Sq. Mt). Executed by Digital Singed by (Sampada 2.0) Release Right’s Deed No. MP7IGR17552025A100370790, on dated 26/05/2025 , in Favour of Mrs. Akila Bee W/o Mr. Abdul Gani, R/o:- Gram Hasalpur, Tahsil Mhow, District Indore (M.P.). 

 

Note - Lower Area to be considered for funding in this case

technical_approvals.remarks: This is LAP case. Property is self occupied residential. Age of property is 20 year old. Area mis match, as per document plot area is 1663 sqft but as on site plot area is 2021 sqft, lower area consider. At back side of property pond is situated. Property lies in GP limit. House hold of village Hasalpur is 839 and population is 5026.

Property is self occupied residential. Age of property is 20 year old. Area mis match, as per document plot area is 1663 sqft but as on site plot area is 2021 sqft, lower area consider. At back side of property pond is situated. Property lies in GP limit. House hold of village Hasalpur is 839 and population is 5026.
ok as recommended. Surrounding development and habitation is on lower side so salability and marketability are concerning.

approval_summary.remarks:
Dear sir
Case recommended for rs 11 Lac // 16% ROI // 120 Months // SORP Property

Case is recommending for approval, applicant is engaged in Tailoring business, having vast experience in this field. Applicant having good track record. collateral is SORP with LTV case. applicant having good asset base. Satisfactory credit visit done by BCM Mr. Lokesh Sharma along with ASM Mr. Gagandeep Singh Bhatia.

Dear Sir
Caption Case recommended for LA--11 Lac/120 M, Customer is engaged in Tailoring Business, Good business Vintage, Positive Reference checked, Decent Loan Track Record, Offered collateral is SORP, Low LTV case, Positive PD done By ASM GaganDeep Bhatia, BCM Lokesh Sharma, and RM ankit Pardeshi.

Approved basis income assessment during visit by BCM Lokesh Sharma, SORP Property as collateral where LTV under the norms.

Subject to legal clearance & other check to be positive.
Please sanction this case in sahaj product
Dear sir Case recommended for rs 11 Lac // 17% ROI // 120 Months // SORP Property // Booked in sahaj Product
